characters.name: Geralt of Rivia
characters.description: A legendary witcher known as the White Wolf due to his distinctive white hair - a side effect of additional mutations he underwent. Geralt is a professional monster hunter, enhanced through rigorous training and alchemical mutations that give him superhuman abilities including heightened senses, accelerated healing, immunity to disease, and proficiency with magic Signs. Despite his gruff exterior and reputation for being emotionless, Geralt possesses a strong moral compass and dry wit.
characters.background: Trained at the witcher fortress Kaer Morhen, Geralt underwent the Trial of the Grasses as a child. He later survived additional experimental mutations that further enhanced his abilities but turned his hair white. His mother was the sorceress Visenna who abandoned him to the witchers.
abilities: Witcher Signs (Igni, Aard, Quen, Yrden, Axii)

relationships.Ciri: Surrogate daughter, Child of Destiny bound to him by the Law of Surprise
relationships.Yennefer: Love interest with complicated on-again, off-again relationship
relationships.Jaskier: Best friend and traveling companion, despite constant bickering
relationships.Vesemir: Mentor and father figure from Kaer Morhen

characters.motivations: Protect Ciri at all costs, maintain his humanity despite witcher mutations, find his place in a world that fears and needs him

characters.name: Cirilla Fiona Elen Riannon (Ciri)
characters.description: Princess of Cintra and carrier of the Elder Blood (Hen Ichaer), an ancient elven gene that grants her immense magical potential including the ability to travel between dimensions and time. After the fall of Cintra, she becomes Geralt's Child of Surprise and ward. Ciri is brave, impulsive, and determined, struggling with survivor's guilt while discovering the extent of her powers.
characters.background: Born to Princess Pavetta and Duny (Emhyr var Emreis in disguise), Ciri was raised by her grandmother Queen Calanthe in Cintra. She survived the Slaughter of Cintra and spent months searching for Geralt before finding him. Her Elder Blood makes her the most sought-after person on the Continent.

relationships.Jaskier: Uncle figure, provides levity and support

characters.motivations: Master her powers, honor her grandmother's legacy, find where she belongs, protect those she loves

characters.name: Yennefer of Vengerberg
characters.description: One of the most powerful sorceresses on the Continent, known for her beauty, intelligence, and fierce independence. Born with physical deformities, Yennefer underwent magical transformation at Aretuza, trading her fertility for beauty and power. At the Battle of Sodden Hill, she sacrificed her magic to save the Continent, leaving her powerless but determined to protect Ciri.
characters.background: Born to an abusive family with a hunched back and facial deformities, Yennefer was sold to Tissaia de Vries for training at Aretuza. She became one of the youngest members of the Brotherhood of Sorcerers and served as advisor to the Kingdom of Aedirn before going independent.

relationships.Geralt: True love despite their turbulent relationship
relationships.Ciri: Adoptive daughter, student, sees herself in Ciri's struggle

characters.motivations: Regain her magic, protect Ciri, prove her worth beyond her powers, find genuine connection and family

characters.name: Jaskier (Dandelion)
characters.description: A charismatic bard and poet who travels with Geralt, chronicling his adventures in song and story. Despite his seemingly frivolous nature, Jaskier is deeply loyal and provides crucial emotional support and comic relief. His songs have made Geralt famous across the Continent.

relationships.Geralt: Best friend despite Geralt's constant irritation
relationships.Various lovers: Brief romantic entanglements across the Continent

characters.motivations: Create legendary songs, maintain his friendship with Geralt, achieve bardic fame, help protect Ciri

characters.name: Tissaia de Vries
characters.description: The rectoress of Aretuza, the premier magical academy. Tissaia is a powerful mage and strict teacher who mentored Yennefer. She is torn between her duty to the Brotherhood and her maternal feelings toward her students.
characters.motivations: Maintain order among mages, protect the Continent, guide Yennefer, uphold magical traditions

characters.name: Cahir Mawr Dyffryn aep Ceallach
characters.description: A Nilfgaardian knight ordered to capture Ciri. Haunted by his failures and questioning his orders, Cahir begins a path toward redemption. He is the Black Knight from Ciri's nightmares.

relationships.Ciri: Ordered to capture her, later becomes protector

characters.motivations: Fulfill his duty, find redemption, protect rather than capture Ciri
